result.eng: It was soft day. It was raining softly.
result.html: Lá bog a bhí annIt was soft day. It was raining softly.
result.ponchtml: Lá bog a ḃí annIt was soft day. It was raining softly.

result.ga: Slán agat a Éanna Tóg go bog é
result.orig: Slán agat a Éanna Tóg go bog é
result.html: Slán agat a Éanna Tóg go bog éGoodbye, Éanna. Take it easy!
result.ponchtml: Slán agat a Éanna Tóg go bog éGoodbye, Éanna. Take it easy!

result.eng: Goodbye for now, Éanna. Take it easy!
